mapper.sql: ID, name, lessonNo, lessontime, number, creatorID, locked, isDel, createTime
mapper.insert:
insert into lesson
ID,
name,
lessonNo,
lessontime,
number,
creatorID,
locked,
isDel,
createTime,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{lessonno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{lessontime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{number,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{creatorid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update lesson
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lessonNo = #{lessonno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lessontime = #{lessontime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
number = #{number,jdbcType=INTEGER},
creatorID = #{creatorid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
locked = #{locked,jdbcType=TINYINT},
isDel = #{isdel,jdbcType=TINYINT},
createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update lesson set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lessonNo = #{lessonno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lessontime = #{lessontime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, number = #{number,jdbcType=INTEGER}, creatorID = #{creatorid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, locked = #{locked,jdbcType=TINYINT}, isDel = #{isdel,jdbcType=TINYINT}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, name, lessonNo, lessontime, number, creatorID, locked, isDel, createTime from lesson where creatorID=#{creatorID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT lesson_member.ID AS memberID,lesson_member.isDel AS isdel,`user`.`name` AS name,`user`.major AS major,`user`.class AS className,`user`.number AS number FROM((lesson JOIN lesson_member on((lesson_member.lessonID=lesson.ID))) JOIN `user` ON((lesson_member.userID=`user`.ID))) WHERE lesson.ID=#{lessonId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ID, name, lessonNo, lessontime, number, creatorID, locked, isDel, createTime from lesson where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
